[[wikipedia:ProCurve_Products#Centralised_wireless|'''ProCurve Products#Centralised wireless''' on '''Wikipedia''']] ::It appears that these devices are designed to be centrally controlled via a compatible ProCurve switch (5300xl / 5400zl / 8200zl) w/ a Wireless Edge Services Module (xl for *xl switches, zl for *zl switches).
